doc.field: Correspondence. National Academy of Arbitrators materials. NYS Board of Mediation materials. National Committee for Rural Schools materials. Workmen's Circle and union newsletters. Liberal Party materials. Clippings. Pamphlets. Course materials. American Socialist Society By-Laws. Bibliography index cards for dissertation. Civil service material. Mediator job descriptions.
